snippet: Rafael Nadal rallied from a set down and fought off a match point in the third set to beat Alexander Zverev, 6-7 (8), 6-0, 7-5, and reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal rallied from a set down and fought off a match point in the third set to beat Alexander Zverev, 6-7 (8), 6-0, 7-5, and reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Rallies at Indian Wells

abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Alexander Zverev, 6-7 (8), 6-0, 7-5, to reach BNP Paribas Open quarterfinals.
